title: Refactor ZoteroMCPClient to native async
description:
## Problem
The ZoteroMCPClient uses asyncio.run() internally which conflicts with FastAPI's event loop.
Currently using ThreadPoolExecutor workaround in http_server.py - works but adds overhead.

## Proposed Solution
1. Make _call_tool_async the primary interface
2. Remove asyncio.run() from call_tool
3. Add proper async methods throughout client.py, proxy.py, workflows.py
4. HTTP server can then call async methods directly

## Benefits
- No thread pool overhead
- Proper async/await throughout
- Better resource utilization
- Cleaner code
